overview: Summer One is more than a look at World Surfing in the 21st Century â€“ it is an avant-garde journey to the high competition of the King of extreme sports, on a "surf trip" through the best international championships, with a mandatory visit to the most charismatic Portuguese waves.  In the settings of the Old Continent and the Atlantic Islands, the best Athletes in the world go beyond the limits of contemporary Surf, illuminated by an exclusively Portuguese Soundtrack.  Tito da Costa shows in a pioneering way the current state of national and international surfing, in a film where the talent of the best Portuguese athletes is mixed with the music of some of the most talented artists in national music.
title: Summer One
